title: Chunhyang
writer: Sang-hyun Cho (story), Hye-yun Kang, Myung-gon Kim
actors: Hyo-jeong Lee, Seung-woo Cho, Sung-nyu Kim, Hak-young Kim
plot: Mongryong marries the beautiful Chunhyang without telling his father, the Governor of Namwon. When his father is transferred to Seoul, Mongryong has to leave Chunhyang and finish his exams....
